preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 100 g of Bismuth using a precision scale. 
 2. Weigh 100 g of Cerium. 
 3. Weigh 60 g of Lithium. 
 4. Weigh 30 g of Antimony. 
 5. In a dry, clean container, combine all ingredients thoroughly using a spatula to ensure even distribution.
